briefdescription.para: UUID of the "Device Info" service.
Constructs a new Pokit service with parent.
Destroys this DeviceInfoService object.
Read all characteristics.

detaileddescription.para: This convenience function will queue refresh requests of all characteristics supported by this service.
Relevant *Service::*Read signals will be emitted by derived class objects as each characteristic is successfully read.

briefdescription.para: Read the Device Info service's Firmware Revision characteristic.

detaileddescription.para: Returns true is the read request is succesfully queued, false otherwise (ie if the underlying controller it not yet connected to the Pokit device, or the device's services have not yet been discovered).
Emits firmwareRevisionRead() if/when the characteristic has been read successfully.

briefdescription.para: Read the Device Info service's Hardware Revision characteristic.

detaileddescription.para: Returns true is the read request is succesfully queued, false otherwise (ie if the underlying controller it not yet connected to the Pokit device, or the device's services have not yet been discovered).
Emits hardwareRevisionRead() if/when the characteristic has been read successfully.

briefdescription.para: Read the Device Info service's Manufacturer Name characteristic.

detaileddescription.para: Returns true is the read request is succesfully queued, false otherwise (ie if the underlying controller it not yet connected to the Pokit device, or the device's services have not yet been discovered).
Emits manufacturerNameRead() if/when the characteristic has been read successfully.

briefdescription.para: Read the Device Info service's Model Number characteristic.

detaileddescription.para: Returns true is the read request is succesfully queued, false otherwise (ie if the underlying controller it not yet connected to the Pokit device, or the device's services have not yet been discovered).
Emits modelNumberRead() if/when the characteristic has been read successfully.

briefdescription.para: Read the Device Info service's Software Revision characteristic.

detaileddescription.para: Returns true is the read request is succesfully queued, false otherwise (ie if the underlying controller it not yet connected to the Pokit device, or the device's services have not yet been discovered).
Emits softwareRevisionRead() if/when the characteristic has been read successfully.

briefdescription.para: Read the Device Info service's (undocumented) Serial Number characteristic.

detaileddescription.para: Returns true is the read request is succesfully queued, false otherwise (ie if the underlying controller it not yet connected to the Pokit device, or the device's services have not yet been discovered).
Emits serialNumberRead() if/when the characteristic has been read successfully.

briefdescription.para: Returns the most recent value of the Device Info service's Manufacturer Name characteristic.

detaileddescription.para: The returned value, if any, is from the underlying Bluetooth stack's cache. If no such value is currently available (ie the serviceDetailsDiscovered signal has not been emitted yet), then a null QString is returned.

briefdescription.para: Returns the most recent value of the Device Info service's Model Number characteristic.

detaileddescription.para: The returned value, if any, is from the underlying Bluetooth stack's cache. If no such value is currently available (ie the serviceDetailsDiscovered signal has not been emitted yet), then a null QString is returned.

briefdescription.para: Returns the most recent value of the Device Info service's Hardware Revision characteristic.

detaileddescription.para: The returned value, if any, is from the underlying Bluetooth stack's cache. If no such value is currently available (ie the serviceDetailsDiscovered signal has not been emitted yet), then a null QString is returned.

briefdescription.para: Returns the most recent value of the Device Info service's Firmware Revision characteristic.

detaileddescription.para: The returned value, if any, is from the underlying Bluetooth stack's cache. If no such value is currently available (ie the serviceDetailsDiscovered signal has not been emitted yet), then a null QString is returned.

briefdescription.para: Returns the most recent value of the Device Info service's Software Revision characteristic.

detaileddescription.para: The returned value, if any, is from the underlying Bluetooth stack's cache. If no such value is currently available (ie the serviceDetailsDiscovered signal has not been emitted yet), then a null QString is returned.

briefdescription.para: Returns the most recent value of the Device Info service's (undocumented) Serial Number characteristic.

detaileddescription.para: The returned value, if any, is from the underlying Bluetooth stack's cache. If no such value is currently available (ie the serviceDetailsDiscovered signal has not been emitted yet), then a null QString is returned.

xrefdescription.para: Unlike other string characteristics, Pokit (Pro) devices always appear to add a trailing null byte to serial number strings. So here we strip any that are present.

briefdescription.para: This signal is emitted when the Manufacturer Name characteristic has been read successfully.
This signal is emitted when the Model Number characteristic has been read successfully.
This signal is emitted when the Hardware Revision characteristic has been read successfully.
This signal is emitted when the Firmware Revision characteristic has been read successfully.
This signal is emitted when the Software Revision characteristic has been read successfully.
This signal is emitted when the Serial Number characteristic has been read successfully.
Constructs a new Pokit service with parent, and private implementation d.
The DeviceInfoService class accesses the Device Info service of Pokit devices.
